hero.title: Fix Your Broken Website Fast
hero.subtitle: Professional web developer specializing in rescuing broken websites, modernizing outdated designs, and boosting performance. Get your site back online in 72 hours.

services.title: What I Fix & Improve
services.subtitle: From broken functionality to outdated designs, I specialize in bringing websites back to life and making them better than ever.
services.repair_description: Fix broken functionality, resolve errors, and restore your website to full working order.
services.performance_description: Speed up slow websites with advanced optimization techniques and modern best practices.
services.mobile_description: Ensure your website looks and functions perfectly on all devices, from desktops to smartphones.
services.security_description: Protect your site from malware, hackers, and vulnerabilities with comprehensive security audits and fixes.
services.seo_description: Improve your search engine rankings and drive organic traffic with expert SEO strategies.
services.design_description: Modernize your website's look and feel with a fresh, user-friendly design that converts.
services.emergency_subtitle: Website completely down? Need an urgent fix? I offer 24-hour emergency repair services.

portfolio.title: Success Stories
portfolio.subtitle: Real websites I've rescued and transformed. See the dramatic improvements in performance, design, and user experience.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Site Revival
ecommerce.description: Rescued a broken e-commerce site with 3-second load times and 40% cart abandonment. Reduced load time to 0.8s and increased conversions by 65%.

restaurant.title: Restaurant Website Modernization
restaurant.description: Transformed an outdated restaurant website into a modern, mobile-first experience with online ordering integration.

corporate.title: Corporate Site Security Fix
corporate.description: Fixed critical security vulnerabilities and implemented SEO best practices for a corporate website, recovering from Google penalties.

saas.title: SaaS Platform Optimization
saas.description: Optimized a slow SaaS platform, fixing database queries and implementing modern UI/UX patterns to improve user retention.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: No hidden fees, no hourly billing surprises. Choose the package that fits your needs and get your website fixed fast.
pricing.quick_fix_description: Perfect for urgent fixes and minor issues
pricing.guarantee_subtitle: Not happy with the results? Get your money back, no questions asked. I stand behind every project with a full satisfaction guarantee.

contact.title: Get Your Free Website Assessment
contact.subtitle: Send me your website URL and I'll provide a detailed report of what's broken and how to fix it - completely free, no strings attached.
contact.message_sent_text: Thanks for reaching out! I'll review your website and get back to you within 2 hours with a detailed assessment and timeline.
contact.urgent_help_description: If your website is completely down or facing a critical issue, use our emergency line.
contact.message_placeholder: Tell me about your website's issues, what you've tried, and what you hope to achieve.

footer.description: Professional web developer specializing in rescuing broken websites and bringing them back to life.
